Welcome to My Academic Homepage

Hello! I’m Wu (吴) Bin (彬), a current graduate student at School of Computer Science, Wuhan University. You can also call me by my online name Luo Jiaming, which is pronounced as "珞珈民" in Chinese, refering to the residents of Mount Luojia.

I am a member of the MARS group, and my advisor is Professor Ye Mang.

Research Interests

My rearch interests include Computer Vision, Lifelong Learning, Multi-task Learning, Domain Adaptation & Generalization, etc.

Latest News

Admitted to Wuhan University's School of Computer Science

June 20, 2024

I am excited to announce that I have been admitted to the School of Computer Science at Wuhan University as a graduate student.

Secured First Prize in Python A Group at the 15th Blue Bridge Cup Programming Contest

June 04, 2024

I am honored to have achieved fourth place and secured the first prize in the Python A Group at the 15th Blue Bridge Cup Programming Contest.
